Chaka, excuse me.\""},{"lineNumber":104973,"originalJapaneseLine":"マリスはそっとチャカを脱がすと","translatedEnglishLine":"Maris quietly undressed Chaka,"},{"lineNumber":104974,"originalJapaneseLine":"アスカの背を押して促す。","translatedEnglishLine":"and gently pushed Asuka's back to encourage her."},{"lineNumber":104975,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………別室に」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...To the adjoining room.\""},{"lineNumber":104976,"originalJapaneseLine":"五分後――","translatedEnglishLine":"Five minutes later—"},{"lineNumber":104977,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うっとり……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ecstatic...\""},{"lineNumber":104978,"originalJapaneseLine":"「か、かっこ、よかったぁ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, so cool...\""},{"lineNumber":104979,"originalJapaneseLine":"別室から出てきたアスカは夢見心地になっていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Asuka emerged from the adjoining room, looking dreamy."},{"lineNumber":104980,"originalJapaneseLine":"「十五回もしてもらった……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"He did it with me fifteen times...\""},{"lineNumber":104981,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さささ、もう行くぞ、アスカ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"C-c-come on, let's go, Asuka.\""},{"lineNumber":104982,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それでは、ほ、本当に失礼を……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then, I-I truly must apologize...\""},{"lineNumber":104983,"originalJapaneseLine":"何度もペコペコと頭を下げて","translatedEnglishLine":"Bowing repeatedly with deep respect,"},{"lineNumber":104984,"originalJapaneseLine":"二人は去って行った。","translatedEnglishLine":"the two of them left."},{"lineNumber":104985,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":104986,"originalJapaneseLine":"「マリスも人並みに子供には弱かったのね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Maris is also just as weak to children as anyone else.\""},{"lineNumber":104987,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええ……なんと言えば……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes... how should I say...?"},{"lineNumber":104988,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いえ、その、疲れました……」","translatedEnglishLine":"No, well, I'm tired...\""},{"lineNumber":104989,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふ、この城であんなこと言えるの、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe, you're about the only one in this castle who can say things like that.\""},{"lineNumber":104990,"originalJapaneseLine":"　アスカくらいなものでしょうねぇ〜」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Probably just Asuka~\""},{"lineNumber":104991,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さて、面白いものも見たし、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then, we've seen some interesting things,"},{"lineNumber":104992,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そろそろ仕事に戻りましょうか」","translatedEnglishLine":"so shall we get back to work soon?\""},{"lineNumber":104993,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええ、そうですね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, that's right."},{"lineNumber":104994,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そうしましょう」","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's do that.\""},{"lineNumber":104995,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah."},{"lineNumber":104996,"originalJapaneseLine":"　じゃ、その前に変身シーン、リアにも見せてね」","translatedEnglishLine":"But before that, show Ria the transformation scene too.\""},{"lineNumber":104997,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":104998,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それは――」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well—that's...\""},{"lineNumber":104999,"originalJapaneseLine":"「命令よ、マリス」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's an order, Maris.\""},{"lineNumber":105000,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":105001,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こ、こほん――では失礼をして……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ahem, w-well then, excuse me...\""},{"lineNumber":105002,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ……うっとり……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Haa... so enchanting...\""},{"lineNumber":105003,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うう、申し訳ありませんでした、マリス殿……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, I am truly sorry, Lord Maris...\""},{"lineNumber":105004,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あら？　あれは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh? What's that...?\""},{"lineNumber":105005,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城の廊下を歩いていたマリアが","translatedEnglishLine":"Maria, who was walking down the corridor of Rance Castle,"},{"lineNumber":105006,"originalJapaneseLine":"何かに気づいて中庭に出て行った。","translatedEnglishLine":"noticed something and went out into the courtyard."},{"lineNumber":105007,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、マリア」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, Maria.\""},{"lineNumber":105008,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お〜〜……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ooooh...\""},{"lineNumber":105009,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぷくぷく、まるまる……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Puff puff, round round... "},{"lineNumber":105010,"originalJapaneseLine":"　でろ〜……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Dero~...\""},{"lineNumber":105011,"originalJapaneseLine":"気の抜けた声と共にアスカが両手を突き出すが、","translatedEnglishLine":"Asuka stretched out both hands with a listless voice,"},{"lineNumber":105012,"originalJapaneseLine":"何も起きず、アスカは不満そうに唇を尖らせた。","translatedEnglishLine":"but nothing happened, and Asuka pouted her lips in dissatisfaction."},{"lineNumber":105013,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なにしてるの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What are you doing?\""},{"lineNumber":105014,"originalJapaneseLine":"「幻獣魔法を教えてるの」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm teaching her beast magic.\""},{"lineNumber":105015,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんでまた？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Why is that?\""},{"lineNumber":105016,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私の幻獣、気に入っちゃったんだって」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"She really likes my beast spirit.\""},{"lineNumber":105017,"originalJapaneseLine":"近くのテーブルの上に置かれた","translatedEnglishLine":"On a nearby table,"},{"lineNumber":105018,"originalJapaneseLine":"チャカが説明の補足を加える。","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaka added further explanation."},{"lineNumber":105019,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、それで最近はずっとアスカは","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, and because of that, Asuka has been following Mil-sama around constantly lately...\""},{"lineNumber":105020,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ミル殿につきまとうようになり……","translatedEnglishLine":""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリスはそっとチャカを脱がすと
アスカの背を押して促す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and gently pushed Asuka's back to encourage her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 別室から出てきたアスカは夢見心地になっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Asuka emerged from the adjoining room, looking dreamy.
"He did it with me fifteen times..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何度もペコペコと頭を下げて
「マリスも人並みに子供には弱かったのね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Maris is also just as weak to children as anyone else."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふ、この城であんなこと言えるの、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, you're about the only one in this castle who can say things like that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アスカくらいなものでしょうねぇ〜」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then, we've seen some interesting things,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そろそろ仕事に戻りましょうか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so shall we get back to work soon?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じゃ、その前に変身シーン、リアにも見せてね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But before that, show Ria the transformation scene too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うう、申し訳ありませんでした、マリス殿……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, I am truly sorry, Lord Maris..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城の廊下を歩いていたマリアが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria, who was walking down the corridor of Rance Castle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何かに気づいて中庭に出て行った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: noticed something and went out into the courtyard.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気の抜けた声と共にアスカが両手を突き出すが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Asuka stretched out both hands with a listless voice,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何も起きず、アスカは不満そうに唇を尖らせた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but nothing happened, and Asuka pouted her lips in dissatisfaction.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私の幻獣、気に入っちゃったんだって」
近くのテーブルの上に置かれた
チャカが説明の補足を加える。
「うむ、それで最近はずっとアスカは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, and because of that, Asuka has been following Mil-sama around constantly lately..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミル殿につきまとうようになり……

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
